Pre-Game Insights: Martinique will compete in the top division once again this season. They maintained their League A status in the previous edition.
Guyana earned promotion to League A for the first time in the previous edition following a flawless campaign that saw them winning all five matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the first time Martinique and Guyana will face each other.
Others: Martinique opened their campaign in Group A with a 3-1 defeat to Guatemala in an away fixture, which leaves the hosts fourth with no points.
Guyana lost their Group A opening game at home 3-1 against Suriname.
